title: LSTM segmentation fault in docker
body_html:
Issue description

LSTM module fails with Segmentation fault (exit code 139) in docker.

Code example

import torch

torch.nn.LSTM(input_size=1,
              hidden_size=1,
              num_layers=3)(torch.randn(7500, 1, 1))

This code fails with code 139 in docker only; in python virtual env when number of layers is high enough it exists with code 137.

To reproduce segmentation fault issue save the code above to lstm_139.py file and run docker:

docker run --rm -it -v `pwd`/lstm_139.py:/lstm_139.py pytorch/pytorch python3 /lstm_139.py ; echo $?

System Info

PyTorch version: 0.4.0

## Code example

torch.nn.LSTM(input_size=1,
